description: CRM + Supabase project for loan management. Context7 configured to index only source code and Supabase functions, excluding build artefacts and node_modules.
rules: Use Supabase RLS policies for every new table
Do not commit secrets or API keys to the repo
Prefer service-layer abstractions instead of direct DB calls inside components
Follow clean architecture: components → services → utils
Run ESLint and Prettier before pushing
